welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hoor, a charming city known for its beautiful landscapes, rich history, and friendly locals. We invite you to immerse yourself in our city and discover all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories in Hoor!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Ljungbyhed Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Ljungbyhed Airport handles all freight and logistics operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Sturup Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for charter and low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
